content:
It seems that this Skladiště in slumy of the Chrámová čtvrť has gotten a lot of use through the years.

Obsah
1	Ve hře Zaklínač
1.1	Úkoly
2	Ve „Vedlejších účincích”
2.1	Úkoly
Ve hře Zaklínač

The warehouse is where Vincent conducts his little "sting operation" on the local Salamandra he's recently identified. When Geralt gets out of prison, the captain suggests that the witcher stay way from the warehouse in the slums, especially around midnight. A witcher's sword would not be needed then. Indeed!

Úkoly
Hrobníkův vděk
Podezřelý: Vincent Meis
Ve „Vedlejších účincích”

Skladiště is also where the tajemný kamenný that Drevin spoke of is located v úkolu Záhadný poklad.

Úkoly
Záhadný poklad
